mapper.select: select * from qa where qa_question_num = 0 order by qa_register_date DESC

choose.when: insert into qa(userinfo_num, qa_title, qa_content, qa_register_date, qa_update_date, qa_question_num) values(#{userinfo_num}, #{qa_title}, #{qa_content}, sysdate(), sysdate(), #{qa_question_num})
choose.otherwise: insert into qa(userinfo_num, qa_title, qa_content, qa_register_date, qa_update_date) values(#{userinfo_num}, #{qa_title}, #{qa_content}, sysdate(), sysdate())

mapper.update: update qa set qa_status = (case qa_status when 1 then 0 when 0 then 1 end) where qa_num = #{qa_num}
